game.name: Space Delivery
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 자막 옵션, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Grab your crew for a high-stakes co-op horror run. You have 5 days to meet the quota. Haul valuable and dangerous, cargo from procedural levels and surreal, shifting dimensions. Survive deadly entities and daily Galactic Events. Get paid. Get upgraded. Survive the week.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Grab your crew for a high-stakes co-op horror run. You have 5 days to meet the quota. Haul valuable and dangerous, cargo from procedural levels and surreal, shifting dimensions. Survive deadly entities and daily Galactic Events. Get paid. Get upgraded. Survive the week.
